Song.title: The Gospel Was Promised
Song.copyright: Â© 2013 Sovereign Grace Praise Words & Music by Bob Kauflin & Joel Sczebel

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: The [A]gospel was promised{,} by sages and prophets [D] The Scriptures spoke of a [A]Son Des[A]cendant of David{,} and yet uncreated [D] Clothed in our flesh He would [A]come Pre[F#m]destined to [E]seek us, He [A]took on our weakness [Bm] And died our [F#m]death on the [D]cross But [F#m]just as was [E]spoken, the [A]grave could not hold Him [Bm] The glorious [F#m]Son of [D]God
Chorus: His name is [A]Jesus His name is [E]Jesus His name is [F#m]Jesus C[D]hrist, our L[A]ord [E]
Verse 2: We're [A]loved and forgiven, compelled by a vision [D] To see His mercy pro[A]claimed An[A]nouncing salvation{,} to every nation [D] All for the sake of His [A]name We're [F#m]no longer [E]strangers, for [A]Jesus, our Savior [Bm] Has come to [F#m]make us His [D]own We're [F#m]called to be [E]holy{,} and [A]now we live only [Bm] To make His [F#m]glory k[D]nown
Inst.: [||: Em | Bm | G D | A :||]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 the gospel was promised by sages and prophets the scriptures spoke of a son descendant of david and yet uncreated clothed in our flesh he would come predestined to seek us he took on our weakness and died our death on the cross but just as was spoken the grave could not hold him the glorious son of god chorus his name is jesus his name is jesus his name is jesus christ our lord verse 2 were loved and forgiven compelled by a vision to see his mercy proclaimed announcing salvation to every nation all for the sake of his name were no longer strangers for jesus our savior has come to make us his own were called to be holy and now we live only to make his glory known inst
